org.apache.solr.handler.component

Class StatsField.HllOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.handler.component.StatsField.HllOptions
  • Enclosing class:
    StatsField

    public static final class StatsField.HllOptions
extends Object
    Helper Struct for parsing and encapsulating all of the options relaed to building a HLL
    See Also:
    StatsField.Stat.cardinality
    NOTE: This API is for internal purposes only and might change in incompatible ways in the next release.

    • Method Detail

      • parseHllOptions

        public static StatsField.HllOptions parseHllOptions(SolrParams localParams,
                                                    SchemaField field)
                                             throws SolrException
        Creates an HllOptions based on the (local) params specified (if appropriate).
        Parameters:
        localParams - the LocalParams for this StatsField
        field - the field corresponding to this StatsField, may be null if these stats are over a value source
        Returns:
        the StatsField.HllOptions to use based on the params, or null if no HLL should be computed
        Throws:
        SolrException - if there are invalid options
